TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MoveItemType extends ExchangeWebServices.BaseMoveCopyItemType

Docs.summary: The class represents an operation to move items in a mailbox.

remarks.para: The item identifier of the new item is returned in the response message (). An item identifier is not returned in a response for a cross-mailbox or mailbox to public folder MoveItem operation.

example.para: The following example shows how to move two items to the Deleted Items default folder.
